languages.text: {n}Компаньонка рядом с Вистенцей тоненько хихикает, но под косым взглядом губернатора вновь принимает почтительно-скорбный вид.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Компаньонка рядом с Вистенцей тоненько хихикает, но под косым взглядом губернатора вновь принимает почтительно-скорбный вид.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The woman standing next to Vistenza laughs delicately, but after a sharp sidelong look from the governor, she resumes her air of deferential sorrow.{/n}

languages.text: {n}站在维丝坦萨身边的女性发出了轻柔的笑声，但却被总督狠狠地瞪了一眼。随后，她立刻恢复了原本恭敬、忧伤的姿态。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The woman standing next to Vistenza laughs delicately, but after a sharp sidelong look from the governor, she resumes her air of deferential sorrow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}站在维丝坦萨身边的女性发出了轻柔的笑声，但却被总督狠狠地瞪了一眼。随后，她立刻恢复了原本恭敬、忧伤的姿态。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La mujer que Vistenza tiene al lado ríe delicadamente, pero tras una mirada fulminante de la gobernadora recupera su aire de pesar y deferencia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The woman standing next to Vistenza laughs delicately, but after a sharp sidelong look from the governor, she resumes her air of deferential sorrow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La mujer que Vistenza tiene al lado ríe delicadamente, pero tras una mirada fulminante de la gobernadora recupera su aire de pesar y deferencia.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ヴィステンツァの隣に立つ女性は上品に笑うものの、総督から鋭い目線を送られると、敬意を含んだ悲哀を再び漂わせる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The woman standing next to Vistenza laughs delicately, but after a sharp sidelong look from the governor, she resumes her air of deferential sorrow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィステンツァの隣に立つ女性は上品に笑うものの、総督から鋭い目線を送られると、敬意を含んだ悲哀を再び漂わせる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Frau neben Vistenza lacht verhalten, setzt aber nach einem tadelnden Seitenblick der Gouverneurin wieder ihre Miene respektvoller Trauer auf.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The woman standing next to Vistenza laughs delicately, but after a sharp sidelong look from the governor, she resumes her air of deferential sorrow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Frau neben Vistenza lacht verhalten, setzt aber nach einem tadelnden Seitenblick der Gouverneurin wieder ihre Miene respektvoller Trauer auf.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La femme à côté de Vistenza pousse un petit rire délicat, mais en voyant le regard sévère que lui lance la gouverneure, elle reprend son air endeuillé.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The woman standing next to Vistenza laughs delicately, but after a sharp sidelong look from the governor, she resumes her air of deferential sorrow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La femme à côté de Vistenza pousse un petit rire délicat, mais en voyant le regard sévère que lui lance la gouverneure, elle reprend son air endeuillé.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vistenza'nın yanında duran kadın inceden gülse de vali yan yan bakınca itaatle o tasalı havasını geri takınıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The woman standing next to Vistenza laughs delicately, but after a sharp sidelong look from the governor, she resumes her air of deferential sorrow.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vistenza'nın yanında duran kadın inceden gülse de vali yan yan bakınca tasalı havasını geri takınıyor.{/n}
